required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Cipros 10 Association on the Isolated Hypertriglyceridemia and Dyslipidemia Treatment
clinical_study.official_title: Phase III, National, Multicenter, Randomized, Double Blind Clinical Trial, to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Cipros 10 Association on Dyslipidemia Treatment

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy of Cipros 10 association in the treatment of Dyslipidemia Treatment

primary_outcome.measure: Reduction of serum triglyceride levels measured between the first visit and last visit.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence and severity of adverse events recorded during the study.

arm_group.description: The study is double-Masked, the patient wil take 2 tablets, as follow: 1 tablet Cipros 10 association; and 1 tablet crestor placebo Oral, once a day.
The study is double-Masked, the patient wil take 2 tablets, as follow: 1 tablet Crestor 10mg; and 1 tablet Cipros association placebo Oral, once a day.
